title: IMMEDIATE ATTENTION!
body: alright, i really need help!  league didnt work, so i tried to uninstall and reinstall back. i am using windows 10 so i went to settings and find the apps and features thing, and uninstalled it there, now i cant find league overthere anymore. but i forgot to delete the League of legends folder in "Riot Games". what should i do? now it doesnt let me delete the folder and i cant download league back! HELP PLEASE

replies.body: Are you seeing a specific error message when trying to reinstall League? If so, can you paste the text portion of the error message here?
i fixed it already, thank you
